scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push
scripts.deploy-all-x: run-s -c commit restore-all-x deploy-frontend-all-x deploy-backend-all-x deploy-serverless-all-x
scripts.local-backend: cd server & set APP_ENV=local & go run .
scripts.local-backend-dev: cd server-dev & set APP_ENV=dev & go run .
scripts.local-backend-prod: cd server-prod & set APP_ENV=prod & go run .
scripts.local-backend-exe: cd server & go build -o server.exe & server.exe
scripts.deploy-frontend-local-1: cd client & echo 'yarn build' & yarn build
scripts.deploy-frontend-local-2: cd client & echo 'firebase use cavalry-app firebase deploy' & firebase use local && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-backend-local: run-s -c deploy-backend-local-1 deploy-backend-local-2 deploy-backend-local-3 deploy-backend-local-4 deploy-backend-local-5
scripts.deploy-backend-local-1: cd server & echo 'godep save ./...' & godep save ./...
scripts.deploy-backend-local-2: cd server & echo 'heroku git:remote -a cavalry-app' & heroku git:remote -a cavalry-app
scripts.deploy-backend-local-3: cd server & echo 'heroku config:set APP_ENV=local git add . git commit -m Deploy' & heroku config:set APP_ENV=local & git add . & git commit -m "Deploy"
scripts.deploy-backend-local-4: cd server & echo 'git push heroku master' & git push heroku master
scripts.deploy-backend-local-5: cd server & echo 'heroku logs -a cavalry-app' & heroku logs -a cavalry-app --tail
scripts.heroku-backend-refresh-local: cross-var "cd server & heroku git:remote -a cavalry-app & heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servernamelocal --confirm $npm_package_config_servernamelocal & git init & git add . & heroku create $npm_package_config_servernamelocal & cd .."
